page.title: 04LEISURE INTERESTS IN DUFTON
page.content: 37 take their leisure mainly outside the village; 14 enjoy outdoor pursuits such as water sports and walking, both locally and in the Lake District. 8 participate in horse sports (riding, Pony Club or harness racing). 16 take their leisure mostly within the village (pub or village events) or on village organised trips. 15 have mostly home-based activities- gardening,diy,handicrafts,sewing, entertaining,reading,T.V.,music and photography. 13 play ball sports (1 golfer and 12 playing evening games of badminton or squash). Other activities mentioned were the theatre,caravanning and swimming. Of the 35 households 9 own a video- recorder, 8 have microwave ovens, and 3 microcomputers.
